author: Text přidal roman
title: Ad Baculum - Religious Opium
text:
Poisoned and fooled by religious amphetamine,you will be destroyed in the grave of sepulchral earth .
living hypnotized by doctrine of lies,we celebrate the new era without religious obscurity and theocracy medness
living hypnotized by doctrine of lies,we celebrate the new era without religious obscurity and theocracy medness
Fucked human shit,cursed existence and no sense
Bleeding for your sado god for all eternity
Ecstase a pleasure of paradise illusion
Impaled on pentagram by the hordes of nazarene’s headhunters
Bleeding for your sado god for all eternity
Ecstase a pleasure of paradise illusion
Impaled on pentagram by the hordes of nazarene’s headhunters
Your god can’t help when you meet their end
Suffer,plague and death spread around this blood world
The lord time Cronos waits for you in hell,abomination chaos and obscurity is your faith
Suffer,plague and death spread around this blood world
The lord time Cronos waits for you in hell,abomination chaos and obscurity is your faith
Chceš vidět méně reklam?
Registruj se
World of shit the promised land,dead zumbies Nazarene ships
I bring the sword of Satan for their heads,two throusand years of night and ignorance
I bring the sword of Satan for their heads,two throusand years of night and ignorance
The vatican’s bastards will burn on ablaze grave of hell.
